title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Production in million gallons, with a total of 12 data points.
Overall Production in million gallons has increased over the Year

Production in million gallons is rapidly increasing from 2008 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2015, gradually increasing from 2015 to 2016, roughly constant from 2016 to 2017, slightly decreasing from 2017 to 2018, and lastly gradually increasing from 2018 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
Max Production in million gallons about 13.2 was recorded at Year 2019
Min Production in million gallons about 5.13 was recorded at Year 2008
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Production in million gallons, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2008 to 2011.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2017 to 2019.
But, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2015 to 2017.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2013 to 2015.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2011 to 2013.
